title: Ep. 117 - Should You Take Profits in Large-Cap Stocks?
itunes:title: Should You Take Profits in Large-Cap Stocks?
description: Extreme Value editor Dan Ferris talks about finding opportunity in large-cap stocks with most trading near 52-week highs. He also tells us how to trade recent winners Microsoft, Intel and Wal-Mart.
content:encoded: Extreme Value editor Dan Ferris talks about finding opportunity in large-cap stocks with most trading near 52-week highs. He also tells us how to trade recent winners Microsoft, Intel and Wal-Mart.
